text: José Eduardo Pérez Ferrada (born 28 July 1985) is a Chilean footballer as an attacking midfielder. ==Career== After playing several years in the Chilean Primera División, Perez signed with Mexican Primera División side Querétaro F.C. on a six-month loan in December 2011. ==References== ==External links== *José Pérez at Football Lineups * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Chilean Primera División players Category:Primera B de Chile players Category:C.D. title: José Pérez Ferrada
